result.arabic_text: وَأُتۡبِعُواْ فِي هَٰذِهِۦ لَعۡنَةٗ وَيَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِۚ بِئۡسَ ٱلرِّفۡدُ ٱلۡمَرۡفُودُ
result.translation: 99. Yalli ama addunyah bagul badat ken xuumuseemih digaaláy keenih уiysissikê luk isi Racmatak ken yayxeerem ken katayse, Qhiyaamah ayró Yalli isi Racmatak ken yayxeereem ken katayse girá ken culsaamat, maxxu gacta catoo kee acwaay keenih abeenim.
